short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play OpenGuessr right in your web-browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OpenGuessr is a fun and educational game that tests your knowledge of the world geography. It is based on geography, landmarks, and places. The game gives you random pictures from around the world, and you have to guess where they are from. It’s like traveling the world without leaving your seat.

The goal is to guess as close as possible to the actual spot on the map.

You use the map on the side of your screen to drop a pin where you think the location is. Once you submit your guess, the game shows the real location and how far you were from it.

OpenGuessr has multiple modes:

Classic Mode:
In this mode, you play at your own pace. There is no time limit, so you can take your time analyzing every detail in the image.

Timed Mode:
This mode is for people who enjoy a challenge. You only have a short time to make your guess. It’s great for practicing quick decision-making.

Multiplayer Mode:
You can play with friends or strangers. Compete to see who can guess the closest. It adds a layer of competition and makes the game even more enjoyable.

Try OpenGuessr today and see how well you know the world! You can also play it on the official website: https://openguessr.com/
